title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 267.3 - Form of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 267.3 - Form of records

State Regulations
(a) No
particular form is required for keeping the records, but such systems of
accounting must be used as will enable the State Tax Commission to ascertain
whether liability for City of Yonkers earnings tax is incurred or whether a
return of information is required to be filed and, if so, the correctness of
the amounts required to be reported in any City of Yonkers earnings tax return
or return of information. (b) See

Part 2402 of this Title for taxpayer record retention formats. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
267.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
